thread.title: WPP's new journey without Sorrell at the helm

title: WPP's new journey without Sorrell at the helm
text:
WPP's new journey without Sorrell at the helm Monday, April 16, 2018 - 01:39 
The world's biggest advertising company WPP heads into uncharted territory as it starts life without its founder Martin Sorrell. Laura Frykberg reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The world's biggest advertising company WPP heads into uncharted territory as it starts life without its founder Martin Sorrell. Laura Frykberg reports Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2HD083S
